summary: The client reported that sprints 2 and 3 still exist and requested an attempt to delete sprint 3 to capture any error message. The architect attempted the deletion via API but received a 400 error indicating that the Sprint ID is required in the request.

actions.task: Include Sprint ID in the API request payload for sprint deletion

backlog_deltas.title: Attempt to delete sprint 3 failed due to missing Sprint ID in API call

risks.risk: API endpoint for sprint deletion fails without required Sprint ID parameter
risks.mitigation: Ensure all required parameters, such as Sprint ID, are included in future API requests
